entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Broken Build]: Attempting upgrade to .Net 10 Preview 1 results in missing virtual directory '_framework' content #47230
  • dotnet tool install is failing: One of the request inputs is out of range. #47223

Closed

  • option to ignore SSL error when install/update dotnet tool #44094
  • [NETSDKE2E]The workload version in ‘dotnet workload --version| --info“ should show the workload set version rather than the manifest version after set update mode to workload-set. #42527
  • ProjectReference doesn't behave the same as PackageReference for contentFiles #2882
    Discussion
  • Poorly formatted launchSettings.json and dotnet watch goes into production #45509

PullRequests

Created

  • Ensure container generation uniformly reports outputs to MSBuild #47234
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • Revert "Use pipeline artifacts for final artifacts" #47233
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix signing opt in/out #47232
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add HttpResults to the ImplicitUsings of ASP.NET Core projects so TypedResults/Results<T1,T2> don't need an explicit using #47231
    untriaged, Area-WebSDK
  • Sync NativeAOTRuntimePack with ILCompilerSupported RIDs #47229
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Enable --interactive by default for sessions that are local. #47226
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add workloads build #47225
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Attempt to Fix and Re-enable HasIncludedFiles Test #47220
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • [release/9.0.1xx] Check shipping packages for poison #47224
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Branch Lockdown
  • Update to clarify the first tuesday branding date #47201
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.3xx' => 'main' #47195
  • Check shipping packages for poison #47176
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Change MSTest Runner to Microsoft.Testing.Platform #47091
    Area-Common templates
  • Allow to fingerprint Blazor.js #46988
    Area-AspNetCore, 10.0.1xx
  • light up container publish for all Exe/WinExe projects by default #47064
    untriaged, Document for new feature, Area-Containers
  • Update Source-Build License Scan Baselines and Exclusions #47221
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Bump MSTest version to 3.8.2 in MSTest templates #47193
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • [release/9.0.1xx] Avoid workload gc failure due to 4-part version in ReleaseVersion used to find a max #46989
    Servicing-consider, Area-Workloads, Branch Lockdown, 9.0.1xx
  • Include only PackageReferences included at runtime in deps.json #46218
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • Commands for generating shell completion scripts + statically-generated bash script #42416
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Area-CLI, cli-ux
  • Suppress welcome message with get* builds Fixes #38444 #47197
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Installer/finalizer in c# #44611
    Area-Infrastructure, 10.0.1xx
  • Add spec for `dotnet run file.cs` #47020
    documentation, Area-run-file
  • Run `AddImplicitDefineConstants` after `PrepareForBuild`. #45877
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • Improve pruned package data loading and handling #46898
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Draft of guidelines for managing various kinds of breaking changes in the SDK #45288
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add ExcludeFromCodeCoverage to template for MSTest, NUnit, XUnit #46866
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove underscore from `_UseManagedNtlm` #47141
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2654113 #47010
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
